Tritonia dorsal swim interneuron.Comment: There are three DSIs: DSI-A,B,C.  DSI-B and DSI-C are indistinguishable from each other.
Tritonia dorsal swim interneuron.Definition: One of three serotonergic neurons on the dorsal surface of the Tritonia cerebral ganglion. Projects an axon contralaterally to the pedal ganglion.  Fires stereotypical bursts of action potentials during a swim motor pattern.
